forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
